chart.name: chart.unpaid.invoice.per.company
chart.title: Unpaid Invoice per Company
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.statusSelect) AS UnpaidInvoice, _partner.name AS partner, MONTH(self.invoiceDate) AS month FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.partner AS _partner WHERE self.invoiceDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate AND self.statusSelect In (1,2,3,4) GROUP BY _partner.name,MONTH(self.invoiceDate)

chart.name: chart.paid.invoice.per.category.per.product
chart.title: Paid Invoice per Category per Product
chart.dataset: SELECT Count(self.id) as count, _productCategory.name AS pcname, _product.name AS pname FROM Invoice AS self JOIN InvoiceLine AS _invoiceLine ON _invoiceLine.invoice = self.id JOIN Product AS _product ON _product.id = _invoiceLine.product JOIN ProductCategory AS _productCategory ON _productCategory.id = _product.productCategory WHERE self.statusSelect = 3 AND self.invoiceDate > :fromDate AND self.invoiceDate < :toDate GROUP BY _productCategory.name, _product.name

chart.name: chart.customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer per Sate
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.name) AS Customer, _Address.state.name AS state FROM Partner self JOIN Address AS _Address ON _Address.id = self.mainAddress GROUP BY _Address.state.name,self.name

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status
chart.title: Amount per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.inTaxTotal) AS Amount, self.statusSelect AS status FROM Invoice self GROUP BY self.statusSelect

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status.linechart
chart.title: Invoice per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT invoice.statusSelect as status, COUNT(invoice.id) as totalinvoice FROM Invoice as invoice GROUP BY invoice.statusSelect
